DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of quetiapine fumarate extended-release (XR) used as mono-therapy, administered once daily, in the treatment of schizophrenic patient with acute episode.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Quetiapine Fumarate in the Treatment of Schizophrenic Patients
DOC.criteria: Schizophrenia diagnosis Provision of written informed consent before initiation of any study AIDS and hepatitis B History of seizure disorder Hospitalisation for schizophrenic more than 1 month immediately before enter into study
